com.googlecode.aluminumproject.configuration

Interface ConfigurationElement

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ActionContributionFactory, ActionFactory, Cache, ClassBasedActionFactory, ConfigurationElementCustomiser, ConfigurationElementFactory, ContextEnricher, ConverterRegistry, ExpressionFactory, FunctionFactory, Library, LibraryElement, Parser, Serialiser, TemplateElementFactory, TemplateFinder, TemplateStoreFinder, TypeFinder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLibrary, AbstractLibraryElement, AbstractTemplateFinder, AbstractTemplateStoreFinder, ActionExecutingFunctionFactory, AluScriptParser, ClassPathTemplateFinder, ContributingActionFactory, DefaultActionContributionFactory, DefaultActionFactory, DefaultConfigurationElementFactory, DefaultConverterRegistry, DefaultTemplateElementFactory, DefaultTypeFinder, ElExpressionFactory, FileSystemTemplateFinder, FileSystemTemplateStoreFinder, GlobalisationContextProvider, InMemoryTemplateStoreFinder, MailContextProvider, MemoryCache, StaticMethodInvokingFunctionFactory, XmlParser, XmlSerialiser

    public interface ConfigurationElement
    A part of a configuration.

    The methods of configuration elements are not meant to be called by objects other than the configurations that contain them.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disable()
      Disables this configuration element.
      void initialise(Configuration configuration)
      Initialises this configuration element.

    • Method Detail

      • initialise

        void initialise(Configuration configuration)
                throws AluminumException
        Initialises this configuration element.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the configuration that this configuration element is part of
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when this configuration element can't be initialised

      • disable

        void disable()
             throws AluminumException
        Disables this configuration element.
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when this configuration element can't be disabled
